resources.string: You are about to go back to main menu. If doing so, you\'ll lose all the progress.
You are about to forfeit the game.
No lobbies available.\nGo ahead and create one!
This is a card game based on ice hockey! Full card deck (52 cards) represents a period. 3 periods will be played, followed by overtime if needed.\nSimple as that.
Both teams need to be fulfilled before the game can start. Choose your positions for the cards wisely!\n\nHint: Center is an important position.

Now it is time to attack! You can only attack another card whose rank is equal or less to your playing card. The center and one of the forwards need to be eliminated before you can attack any defender.
When you have been attacked and lost any players, you need to restore your team before you can counter-attack.\n\nGood luck!
